name: maze to the old castle
description:
maze to the old castle offers - 8 big levels - each level includes various type's of mazes and more natural-growth and animals then most other games.
maze to the old castle - is a casual old-school path-finding maze game and at the same time: Seeks to a-maze - astonish - relax - destress - positivize - tests the participant on (bio-)logic-reasoning and memory thereby seeking to illuminate the minds-eye, and attemps to be fun and challenging in a old-school-game way in finding the right pad exit-solution to the maze.
For each level - there is [TQ](time-quotient)-IQ-illumination-worthyness involved; if one doesnt on time - find the path / solve the maze - one ends up dwelling in darkness and has to use the minds-eye even more (or wait till the sun rises again to illuminate the eye's).
The camera-mode of the game can also be changed into a third-person by simply pressing f1.
The mazes dont have lots of lengthy dead ends but are divided in sections with multiple sections and varying type's of mazes each level with different type's of mazes and ways out of them in every level.
various type's of hedge-mazes,
various type's of forests and various type's of path-finding,
various type's of forest-tree-mazes,
wooden-plank maze,
various mountain and cave path-finding mazes,
various castlewall and castle ruins mazes,


Maze to the old castle is about a-maze-ment more then avoiding unexpected disturbing scary potential game-over-moments - doesnt attemp to disturb one's happy-positive-good-karma-flow state of mind, the game more seeks to a-maze and astonish and illuminate-train one's memory/(bio-)logic-reasoning/minds-eye. Accompanied by relaxing nature sounds one should succeed in having fun in finding the simple-logic-solution-exit to the maze's and reach the old castle as how it was in old-school-games and require's one to think (bio)logic and memorize and use the minds-eye more then just checking out every pathway.

In the past they knew the greatness of a king by the complexity of his mazes and castle more then by the size of his mazes and castle, as the complexity of the mazes made sure many wouldnt even be able to reach the king without proving themselves illuminated-worthy enough. The maze and castle of this king however are both great in complexity and size, can you reach the old castle - like ancient knights/princesses who have proven worthy, or will you end up lost in the maze, dwelling in darkness instead of becomming amazed and illuminated and able to have a clear-memorized-picture fromout the minds-eye. This game seeks to challenge, relax illuminate and amuse any participant.
